layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x66
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x66
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x50
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x50 [bgcolor=#00FF00] [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x48
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x44
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 365x39
                text run at (2,2) width 330: "Here is a bordered table using the CLASS attribute for"
                text run at (2,22) width 365: "background color. The table should have a lime background."
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,2) size 388x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 365x39
                text run at (2,2) width 330: "Here is a bordered table using the CLASS attribute for"
                text run at (2,22) width 365: "background color. The table should have a lime background."
